sourcesContent:
<template>
  <navbar
      :pages="pages"
      :active-page="0"
      :nav-link-click="(index) => (activePage = index)"
  ></navbar>
  <page-content :page="pages[activePage]"></page-content>
</template>

<script>
import PageContent from "../src/components/PageContent.vue";
import Navbar from "./components/Navbar.vue";

export default {
  components: {
    PageContent,
    Navbar,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      activePage: 0,
      pages: [
        {
          link: {text: "home", url: "../sites/home.html"},
          pageTitle: "Home",
          pageContent: "Hello Home",
        },
        {
          link: {text: "double click dummy", url: "../sites/projects.html"},
          pageTitle: "Exercise 1 - 'Double Click Dummy'",
          pageContent: "Hello DCD",
        },
        {
          link: {text: "pls smile", url: "../sites/interaction-design.html",
          },
          pageTitle: "Exercise 2 - 'Pls Smile'",
          pageContent: "Hello ps",
        },
        {
          link: {text: "ein hauch von liebe", url: "../sites/interaction-design.html",
          },
          pageTitle: "Exercise 3 - 'Ein Hauch von Liebe'",
          pageContent: "Hello ps",
        },
      ],
    };
  },
};
</script>
